title: Walgreens And CVS Ban Open Carry
text:
On Thursday, more national chains banned their customers from openly carrying firearms in their stores, even in states where it is legal. This time, pharmacy giants Walgreens and CVS are telling their customers that gun owners are not welcomed there.

"We support the efforts of individuals and groups working to prevent gun violence, and continually review our policies and procedures to ensure our stores remain a safe environment," CVS said in a statement.

Earlier this week, Walmart and Kroger also announced open carry is now prohibited in their stores.

On Fox News on Wednesday, host Tucker Carlson blasted Walmart for their decision to also step selling certain sorts of gun ammunition.

"The company more responsible than any other company for destroying and degrading rural America, for making our towns uglier and cheaper and poorer. The same people who pushed the appalling lie that brightly colored plastic crap from China is going to make us happy. That company is now lecturing normal Americans, the very Americans that they have hurt, how immoral they are for daring to protect themselves with firearms," Carlson said on "Tucker Carlson Tonight."

"Progressives used to attack the company for destroying small town America and for exploiting workers," Carlson continued. "Walmart hired PR consultants and union busters to push back for years, but the company never really changed the way it does business. And, yet somehow the left has mostly stopped attacking them."

"Walmart meanwhile realized it could buy immunity from criticism from the left by mouthing left-wing pieties. That’s all it takes really. Sounding woke and they’ll leave you alone," he remarked.
